title: Oil, Bread, and Justice
summary: Leviticus 24 gives instructions for the lampstand and the bread of the Presence in the tabernacle. It also includes a case involving blasphemy and sets the principle of justice: life for life, eye for eye.

faq.question: What was the bread of the Presence?
faq.answer: Twelve loaves placed before the Lord as a continual offering, replaced every Sabbath.

faq.question: What principle of justice is found here?
